price: Айтадилар: «Ростгўй бўлсангиз, айтинг-чи, бу ваъда қачон юз беради?»
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
